TopicTitle: A possible space plane redesign in our future?

Articles.Content:
I saw this on twitter. Insert your wild speculations below.

https://twitter.com/Maxmaps/status/491959369878482946
Looks a bit like the cockpit of an F-86 Sabre
New models and reworking the Mk line according to the devnotes.
Hype train like speculation : Escape pod for the mk cockpits??

New models and reworking the Mk line according to the devnotes.

Aw, I liked the older models more.

On the other hand, that one seems to have the frond ending in an attachment node, like the MkII Cockpit, but this one seems to be probe-sized(i.e. 615cm or so). So, perhaps that model is a MkIV Cockpit?

I hope the Mk1 and Mk2 cockpits don't get a model overhaul. The Mk1 already has a great IVA and the Mk2 has Sam Hall's IVA mod which is brilliant so they don't need too much change. The Mk2 could use it's own official IVA though. The Mk3 could probably see some change. The entire Mk3 system is kinda useless.
I'd like to see mk3 and maybe even a Mk4. Cargo bays would also be nice, that way we don't have to rely on B9 community fixes.

Something which unlike the current mkI & mkII cockpits, will not look like some weird advanced alien technology? I'm all for that.

I wouldn't mind a replacement for the mkIII either, I think the current one just doesn't look good.

I hope they will rework both mk2 and mk3, because actually are not very useful.

Mk1 and mk2 pods for me are ok, just add IVA.

Hype train like speculation : Escape pod for the mk cockpits??

the two cross-sections of wings makes me hope it's a review of in-game aerodynamics but that's a desperate shot in the dark at best.

can anyone enhance those browser tabs?
Looks like a hotdog to me.

Look like a mk3 replacement,

which is great cause that thing needed a massive overhaul - though I wouldn't mind if it's something new either.

Current mk1 and 2 parts are nice, they fit the game well, but Mk3 are IMHO at the point beyond repair - should be scrapped and re-thought from ground up.

Looks like a hotdog to me.

That's what it was. They were discussing lunch.

Look like a mk3 replacement,

which is great cause that thing needed a massive overhaul - though I wouldn't mind if it's something new either.

Current mk1 and 2 parts are nice, they fit the game well, but Mk3 are IMHO at the point beyond repair - should be scrapped and re-thought from ground up.

I was thinking it looked like the inline mk2

Edited July 23, 2014 by Alshain
Since the Hype is back up, I might have to take my new HypeEngine out for a spin! Pulling into the station, back on tracks to the HypeTrainStation of Moderate Hype.

I really hope that the overhaul of the spaceplane partes also brings with ir an overhaul of the drag and parachute models

Edited July 23, 2014 by chaos_forge
Getting hyped for a plane overhaul! Hopefully we'll see more of this.
MK-3 redesign so it looks better, with IVA for it and MK-2, please?

the two cross-sections of wings makes me hope it's a review of in-game aerodynamics but that's a desperate shot in the dark at best.

One can dream...

In all seriousness, why can't Squad go the route Mojang went with Minecraft and just license high-profile mods as part of the stock game as they saw fit? I doubt many modders would argue, and adding FAR (or the newer NEAR) to the stock game would be easier than completely rebuilding the aerodynamic model they've got now, assuming that's ever planned. The work's already done, they just need to approach the modders.

But I guess the game isn't even feature-finished yet, so picking up mods and refining existing elements is further down the road anyway.

I hope they will rework both mk2 and mk3, because actually are not very useful.

I agree with you on the mk3, but the mk2 - that is very useful, much more than the mk1 for everything except flying from IVA

Look like a mk3 replacement,

which is great cause that thing needed a massive overhaul - though I wouldn't mind if it's something new either.

Current mk1 and 2 parts are nice, they fit the game well, but Mk3 are IMHO at the point beyond repair - should be scrapped and re-thought from ground up.

How does it look like a Mk3 replacement? The Mk3 is a shuttle, so replacing it with a fighter-style cockpit doesn't make much sense.

That looks pretty much like a redesign for the inline one-seater cockpit. And much-needed it is; the current one has some issues, not the least of which being that it's trial-and-error to even figure out which side is the crew hatch since it's not very clearly marked.

Aw, I liked the older models more.

On the other hand, that one seems to have the frond ending in an attachment node, like the MkII Cockpit, but this one seems to be probe-sized(i.e. 615cm or so). So, perhaps that model is a MkIV Cockpit?

No, No - don't quote me that way - I hate these pointless speculation threads. I was pointing people at the dev notes. Anything else your crystal balls may tell you is ... sorry to break it to you ... ........ (testing here to see what the censors make of the word for 'heretical priests')
can we atleast get a Mk3 to 2.5m conversion part.
Looks like a radial attached cockpit. Which would be VERY cool.
